com.lef.scanner

类 Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lef.scanner.Region

  • public class Region
extends java.lang.Object
    自定义一个区域，这个区域可以通过uuid、major、minor属性过滤掉不符合的条件 的beacon。 This class represents a criteria of fields used to match iBeacons. The strange name comes from the iOS implementation, where the idea of a "Region" is also used for a geofence. The idea is that a grouping of one or more iBeacons are analogous to a geofence region. The uniqueId field is used to distinguish this Region in the system. When you set up monitoring or ranging based on a Region and later want to stop monitoring or ranging, you must do so by passing a Region object that has the same uniqueId field value. If it doesn't match, you can't cancel the operation. There is no other purpose to this field. The other fields: proximityUuid, major and minor are a three part unique identifier for a single iBeacon. When constructing a range, any or all of these fields may be set to null, which indicates that they are a wildcard and will match any value. Note that this differs from the iOS implementation that does not let you set a wildcard on the proximityUuid field.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Region

        public Region(java.lang.String uniqueId,
      java.lang.String proximityUuid,
      java.lang.Integer major,
      java.lang.Integer minor)
        Constructs a new Region object to be used for Ranging or Monitoring
        参数:
        uniqueId - - A unique identifier used to later cancel Ranging and Monitoring, or change the region being Ranged/Monitored
        proximityUuid - - region中过滤的uuid
        major - - region中过滤的major
        minor - - region中过滤的minor

        public boolean matchesIBeacon(IBeacon iBeacon)
        Checks to see if an IBeacon object is included in the matching criteria of this Region
        参数:
        iBeacon - the iBeacon to check to see if it is in the Region
        返回:

      • normalizeProximityUuid

        public static java.lang.String normalizeProximityUuid(java.lang.String proximityUuid)
        Puts string to a normalized UUID format, or throws a runtime exception if it contains non-hex digits other than dashes or spaces, or if it doesn't contain exactly 32 hex digits
        参数:
        proximityUuid - uuid with any combination of upper/lower case hex characters, dashes and spaces
        返回:
        a normalized string, all lower case hex characters with dashes in the form e2c56db5-dffb-48d2-b060-d0f5a71096e0
